009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic;
010
011
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
015import imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic;
016
017/**
018 * Performs an exact circle fit to 3 given (non-collinear) points.
019 * If the fit is unsuccessful, {@link #getParameters()} 
020 * returns {@code null}.
021 * 
022 * @author WB
023 *
024 */
025public class CircleFit3Points extends CircleFitAlgebraic {
026        
027        private final double[] p;
028        
029        public CircleFit3Points(Pnt2d p0, Pnt2d p1, Pnt2d p2) {
030                final double x0 = p0.getX();
031                final double y0 = p0.getY();
032                final double x1 = p1.getX();
033                final double y1 = p1.getY();
034                final double x2 = p2.getX();
035                final double y2 = p2.getY();
036                
037                final double A = x0 * (y1 - y2) - y0 * (x1 - x2) + x1 * y2 - x2 * y1;           
038                if (Arithmetic.isZero(A)) {
039                        this.p = null;
040                } 
041                else {
042                        final double R0 = sqr(x0) + sqr(y0);
043                        final double R1 = sqr(x1) + sqr(y1);
044                        final double R2 = sqr(x2) + sqr(y2);
045                        final double B = R0 * (y2 - y1) + R1 * (y0 - y2) + R2 * (y1 - y0);
046                        final double C = R0 * (x1 - x2) + R1 * (x2 - x0) + R2 * (x0 - x1);
047                        final double D = R0 * (x2 * y1 - x1 * y2) + R1 * (x0 * y2 - x2 * y0) + R2 * (x1 * y0 - x0 * y1);        
048                        this.p = new double[] {A, B, C, D};
049                }
050        }
051        
052        public CircleFit3Points(Pnt2d[] pts) {
053                this(pts[0], pts[1], pts[2]);
054        }
055
056        @Override
057        public double[] getParameters() {
058                return this.p;
059        }
060
061}
